text: 18:11 Onger Akaba 135:2; Aisaia 1:15; 58:2; Luk 16:15; Akar Mogomem 3:17Ezɨ Farisin gumazim tugha ua bagha kamaghɨn God mɨgei, ‘Kɨ nɨ mɨnaba, kɨ gumazir mabar mɨn amir puvatɨ. Me biziba okɨava, arazir kurabagh amuava egha amizir paba itiba okɨa me koma akui. Egha kɨ uaghan dagɨaba isir gumazir kamɨn mɨn amir puvatɨ.
